attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app is horrible!!! It took almost a week to download! And also when I launched the app it had disturbing pictures of trump which caused me to have seizures. I was hospitalized for a month. Then I forgot my password so I had to log in to the account and go to setting on how to change my password. Take this app down!!

attributes.title: This app steals your information

It then crashed and I had to delete the app and restart my phone. Iâ€™m sorry mr president but this app just is very heartbreaking. I do not recommend.

attributes.title: A gross waste of space
attributes.review: I downloaded this app with low expectations and was not surprised. This is literally a HUGE waste of space. The app itself serves no purpose to any intelligent humans. Make the app store great again. The orange was left on the vine for too long. It's starting to rot. We better stick it in the trash where it belongs before it stinks up the neighborhood again. :(
